title: Ali Bastian is pregnant with first child
text:
Ali Bastian is pregnant (Picture: Getty Images)

Former Strictly Come Dancing star Ali Bastian is pregnant.

The actress, 37, has confirmed she is expecting her first child with David O’Mahony, with the pair set to welcome their new addition in March next year.

Ali revealed her baby news in an interview with Hello! magazine, where she told the publication she feels ‘incredibly lucky’ to have fallen pregnant, after suffering a heartbreaking miscarriage on New Year’s Eve last year.

Ali, who is known for starring on Hollyoaks, said it ‘took her a while to emotionally process’ miscarrying, but she now feels ‘comfortable’ sharing her experience with others.

Ali and husband David wed in February, earlier this year (Picture: Instagram)

Ali suffered a miscarriage on New Year’s Eve (Picture: Instagram)

‘So many people go through this, which is why we want to be open,’ she said.

Sharing her excitement over her pregnancy, she said: ‘We feel incredibly lucky. The moment I found out, I was so excited I could hardly speak.’

West End star David, who wed Ali in February earlier this year, added: ‘We’ve always wanted children. It’s amazing what Ali and Ali’s body are doing. It’s incredible.’

Ali is currently starring on BBC soap Doctors. She had previously played Becca Dean on Channel 4’s Hollyoaks and appeared as Sally Armstrong on former ITV series The Bill.

Ali had starred on Strictly Come Dancing 10 years ago back in 2009, where she was partnered with Brian Fortuna – they made it to the semi-final on the show and finished in third place.

Her series was won by sports correspondent Chris Hollins and Ola Jordan.
